stories.title: Turkish homepage SEO copy
stories.description: Optimize Turkish hero title + description using keywords: 'kan tahlili nasıl okunur' (3K-10K), 'kan tahlili değerleri ne anlama gelir' (1K-5K), 'kan tahlili takip uygulaması' (200-500), 'tahlil sonuçları' (100-300). Must include 'kan tahlili' in title. Hero title = seo.landingTitle, hero description = seo.landingDescription. Also update landing.heroTitle and landing.heroDescription to match.
acceptanceCriteria: seo.landingTitle is 50-60 chars and contains 'kan tahlili'
seo.landingDescription is 110-160 chars with 2+ keywords naturally included
landing.heroTitle matches seo.landingTitle (with <highlight> tag on one key word)
landing.heroDescription matches seo.landingDescription
Copy reads naturally in Turkish, not keyword-stuffed
All evaluator agents pass
